byline.original: By N. R. KLEINFIELD and PATRICK McGEEHAN

snippet: Most New Yorkers do not use helicopters, far more hear them, and crashes like Tuesday’s are chilling reminders of their presence.
lead_paragraph: Most New Yorkers do not use helicopters, far more hear them, and crashes like Tuesday’s are chilling reminders of their presence.

headline.main: Flying Chariot of the Wealthy, Noisy Bane of the Earthbound
headline.print_headline: Flying Chariot of the Wealthy, Noisy Bane of the Earthbound
headline.seo: Fatal Helicopter Crash Provokes Flights’ Critics
